snippet: Was Manti Te’o a sympathetic victim of a cruel scam or a participant in a phony story to help him in his bid for the Heisman Trophy? A series of events in early December is under scrutiny.
abstract: Journalists, bloggers, students at Notre Dame and American public are trying to figure out whether linebacker Manti Te'o is victim or participant of elaborate hoax; some cannot fathom idea that superstar athlete could be involved in online relationship for years--without in-person meetings; others, younger and more familiar with appeal of online relationships, find him an all too believable victim.
lead_paragraph: Was Manti Te’o a sympathetic victim of a cruel scam or a participant in a phony story to help him in his bid for the Heisman Trophy? A series of events in early December is under scrutiny.

headline.seo: Image of Manti Te’o Becomes Puzzle as Theories Swirl
headline.main: Image Becomes a Puzzle as Theories on Te’o Swirl
headline.print_headline: A Player’s Image Becomes a Puzzle
